description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Personal Observations on Sindh; the manners and customs of its inhabitants, and its productive capabilities: with a sketch of its history, a narrative of recent events, and an account of the connection of the British Government with that country, etc" Author: POSTANS, Thomas - Captain Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 1298.h.13.", "British Library OC T 37243" Page: 74 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1843 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002967330 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life.
